item.description:
YOU MUST PRE-REGISTER FOR THIS EVENT!!

May 11, 2010
Copyright Registration Workshop
Presented by Jim Cavanaugh

ASMP is offering a free two-hour workshop on registering your images with the copyright office. The workshop is open to ASMP members and non-members. The workshop will outline step-by-step the ASMP Best Practices for Registering Your Photographs and each participant will set up a template to make future image registration easy.

Prior to the workshop, go to https://eco.copyright... and set up an online account with the copyright office. Participants need to bring a laptop and their eCO username and password to the workshop.

This workshop is part of ASMP's Registration Â©ounts initiative.

Workshop Topics:
The importance of copyright registration
Common mistakes
Step by step guide to online registration

IMPORTANT: Prior to the workshop, go to https://eco.copyright... and set up an online account with the Copyright Office. Participants need to bring a laptop and their eCO username and password to the workshop. It is also important that everyone has wireless capabilities on their laptops.

Cost: FREE

May 11, 2010
Social Hour: 6pm
Program: 7pm-9pm
EP Levine (New Location)
219 Bear Hill Road
Waltham, MA 02451 (Map)

Pre-register: https://asmp.org/educ...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: How to Register your Images with the Copyright Office
